title: 1.1 Master Challenge 2
question: A student is having trouble connecting his laptop to an external display using an HDMI cable. He needs to use the external display for an important presentation. Devise and list ways to help him diagnose and resolve the connection issue. Create a flow chart and troubleshooting guide for the problem.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
